title: Ranil calls for immediate debate on IMF report
body_lines: Former Prime Minister and UNP Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe has called for an immediate debate in Parliament on the IMF report on Sri Lanka.
"As the Government has agreed to engage the IMF for financial assistance, Parliament must be briefed on their plan of action."
Mr. Wickremesinghe  made this request in a special press statement today.(Yohan Perera)
